sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-card>
    <v-form class="card" @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
      <v-row class="pa-4">
      <v-col :cols="9">
        <v-autocomplete
          class="form-control"
          v-model="newInvestment"
          :items="investmentList"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          outlined dense
          label="Add an investment by typing a name"/>
      </v-col>
      <v-col :cols="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Amount"
          single-line outlined dense
          type="number"
          v-model="investmentAmount" />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
        <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">Add</v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "AddInvestment",
  inject: ["platformId", "scenarioId"],
  data() {
    return {
      newInvestment: {},
      investmentAmount: null,
      investmentList: [],
      error: null
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getInvestmentList() {
      let endpoint = `/api/investmentname/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
        this.investmentList = data.results;
      });
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.newInvestment) {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          name_id: this.newInvestment,
          investment_class_id: 1,
          platform: this.platformId,
          amount: this.investmentAmount
        }).then(data => {
          this.$emit("add-investment", data);
          this.newInvestment = null;
          this.investmentAmount = null;
        });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must select an investment and enter an amount";
      }
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getInvestmentList();
  }
};
</script>
